name: Crystal Chip Collector: Hidden Gem
description:
Richard, a gamer boy fond of games, receives terrible news: his favorite game has undergone an overhaul patch, causing his PC to "lag".

However, Richard is a very clever kid and knows that every problem has a solution somewhere on internet. He sought help from an artificial intelligence and managed to summon two ancient gods to optimize his PC: an ancient deity whom Richard mistakes for someone named "Install Wizard" and a sort of orange cat with a very large head.

Can these unusual beings improve the performance of his PC so that he can continue playing without lag?

---

Supports Joypad and keyboard.
Keyboard controls:
Cursor key: direction
E: jump / action
D: projectile / cancel
Space: Menu
1: restart stage during Puzzle mode

B: change bezel
F: Switch between fullscreen / windowed
Esc: Exit


Touching a harmful chip or a critter won't decrease life counter if ammo can be deducted instead (100 bullets).


Features:
- 60 levels spread across 6 worlds.
- Story mode: Will Richard get a more powerful PC? Will the spirits shun him?
- Puzzle mode: Collect all the chips while using a set amount of energy!
- Invincible mode: Beat each world in the shortest time possible.
